projectTitle: That Marketing Punk - Digital Marketing & Parenting Help
projectDescription:
First time Dad, decade-long Digital Marketing nut and life long Movie and Gaming fan wanting to share his knowledge and expertise!

Okay, so the first thing you are probably thinking is “why on earth should I give this random guy some of my hard earned money?” It is a big and pretty important questions, isn’t it?

So, why should you?  

Well, I’m a first time Dad who is documenting the various experiences I have along the winding road of parenthood, sharing any tips and tricks I find a long the way. On top of that, I am also blogging about the various aspects of being a hands-on Dad, and how to deal with the lifestyle changes.

So, if you’re a new parent, soon to be parent, or someone who just wants to get a different view on things, then hopefully you’ll find something awesome over on That Marketing Punk. 

Oh, and as the name of the blog says, for those of you who run your own website or blog, I also write guides and review tools for Digital Marketing (or “how to get more traffic to my site”), so if you want to increase the performance of your website, then you’ll definitely find something useful! But don’t worry, I don’t talk in jargon. 

And finally, as a huge movie, video game and music fan, I will be reviewing and discussing things from all three of those subjects, so if you like any of them, you’ll find something for you! 

Blogs And Vlogs

I've been running That Marketing Punk for about 6 months now, purely as a written blog format. However, I'm fully aware that not everyone has the time to sit and read a blog post... That's why I'm looking to branch out into a vlog style YouTube series as well.

This will involve 3 different YouTube Shows, with each one covering one of the aspects of That Marketing Punk; Digital Marketing/SEO help, Parenting learnings and advice, and finally, Movie and Game reviews and features.

To do this, as well as improve the quality of the blog posts, I'll need to be able to get hold of a decent camera/microphone setup (to make the vlogs as higher quality as possible), a number of SEO application licenses (to be able to create tutorials for them in an easy to understand manner), and to have budget to allow the creation of animations and visuals for the reviews.

Where Is My Money Going?

Another great question! As mentioned above, this Kickstarter campaign is designed to allow me to purchase the tools to create high quality video tutorials/guide/reviews, as well as acquire the licenses for various SEO tools and to fun the animation and production of the videos.

On top of this, I also have to budget for the Kickstarter fees and supporter rewards.

The follow chart shows how the funds from this campaign will be split.

Stretch Goals - Because What's A Kickstarter Campaign Without Them?

I mean, come on... Everyone loves Stretch Goals, right? And after all... Gotta be ambitious!

projectTitle: Tea Spot: Taste the real tea
projectDescription:
My Tea Story

I was born in a beautiful village surrounded by mountains in southern China (YONG DING). It became well known for its unique rural dwellings (Call tulou, literally: "Fujian earthen buildings")

  

 

 

  

I was living in one of the tulous for years. For most villagers, tea is in their everyday life. People are not only drink tea, but also cook with tea, bath with tea leaves to cure skin diseases. Tea just like many other plants, is an precious gift from wild nature.

 

 

  

 Here, Tea is handpicked, sun dried, manually rolled and roasted. The ancient tea making method has been used by tolou villagers by several centuries.

  

  

 When I was a littlle boy, I was lack of patience. My grandma used to tell me while I was helping her to process tea, "Do something peacefully, slowly, repeatedly is the best way to master it."   I think this is what tea is about, calm, peace and patient.

When I grew up, I moved to City. Where people have complete different life style. Here, everything is fast paced. Teabag is popular in urban side because it's convenient and fast. However, the real tea flavour is barely left.   Living in loud noisy city, I learned to appreciate the real tea. The ritual of having a cup of tea forces me to slow down, empty my mind and relax.

As a tea lover, I've tried many tea beverages from various shops in Melbourne and worked at two tea shops. If not all, most of them are using tea fanning, teabag or  tea powder (the Lowest grade teas). It's aging much faster than undamaged whole leaf, once tea leaf has been damaged, it starts to lose flavour. It's just like coffee. If you grind the coffee bean, you must use it right away.

shown below are two pictures I took while I was working in tea shop.

Just like many tea drink shop, they use tea fannings as well. AND you can easily find many twigs in it (that means it's probably machine picked).

 

________

Tulou black tea before and after infusion.

 

___________________________________________________ 

Tea Tasting Challenge: We asked random people to taste tulou whole leaf tea (The tea we use)and premium teabag tea.

In my tea spot, tea we use is from my home village, YONGDING, Tulou. We refuse to use any low grade tea such as teabags and tea powders. Our goal is to provide high grade tea beverages, introduce real tea drinks to melbourne. Enjoy our awesome tea beverages made by unbroken whole leaf tea, feel the freshness and natural flavor.

Try our awesome fruit teas, great combinations with fresh fruit and whole leaf tea. amazing flavour you won't forget.

 Bubble tea is very popular asian tea beverage. Love it, or Hate it. but, you gona try it. Our bubble tea made with premium moutain whole leaf tea (The bubble, is made by Cassava and brown sugar).

Of course, We serve hot tea for pure tea lovers.

Support us, Support the real tea spirit.

 

_______________

All fund collected from kickstarter will be invested in our tea spot.

appx 50% will be used to purchase tea equirements.

appx 50% will be used for shop decoration.

Other costs and expenses will be convered by our company.

If you have any questions, feel free to leave your question or comment.

I will check them on daily base.

projectTitle: For All Time: A paranormal romance that transcends time!
projectDescription:
"Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend... Inside of a dog, it's too dark to read!"

Welcome to our first Kickstarter Campaign!. With your help we will be able to print and distribute this exciting tale worldwide.

Sign up for our newsletter here. (Don't worry, it will bring you right back to this page.)

Upon successful funding of this project we will print 1,000 hardback and 1,000 paperback copies of For All Time. That's right folks, you heard us, 1,000 of each! We will then begin distribution to retailers and libraries around the world. The more we can print, the wider our audience becomes and the more we can donate to libraries; and we love to give, give, give. We have already begun lining up orders to be met upon successful funding of our campaign. Also, we have already started marketing and promoting through everything from social media, to book blogs, to news outlets. You'll find links to Facebook pages throughout this project page and we will update with any reviews or articles as we receive them. We expect to have the books printed and available in October 2017. You can find a detailed breakdown of how the project funds will be used and the timeline by scrolling further down the page.

With so many changes in publishing today and the constraints that publishing companies often place on writers, more and more authors are turning to self-publishing. We have decided to go a step further and start a publishing company, Enterprise Publishing. While C.L. Montgomery is not a part of the business she is part of the family and we will do whatever it takes to bring her dreams to reality. Recently, we attempted to bring For All Time to the masses by utilizing print on demand services and found this to be pretty much useless. To our dismay and frustration, many things went wrong. Print quality was terrible (both the jacket and the inside pages), and we even discovered the book was listed under an incorrect title through a major retailer; how does that even happen? Of course, we immediately halted production and are now changing printing companies. The book will be printed with quality materials and will be available in stores, not just online.

 

Sometimes death is not the end… Sometimes love blooms in unexpected places… Join Trenton and Brianna in their journey across time. Trenton has been fading in and out of existence for more than a century, until he meets Brianna in the twenty-first century, who seems to make him, in many ways, more alive than he was before his death. For All Time is a paranormal romance that crosses the boundaries of time to find love; bringing the past and present together in a story that will break your heart and make you believe in true love.

Born in the nineteenth century, Trenton has the perfect life; Elizabeth, his beautiful fiancée; Robert, his best friend; life couldn’t be better, until Robert kills him to be with Elizabeth. Trenton is trapped between the living and the dead, alone and unseen, until Brianna stumbles across his decaying plantation. Shocked when she speaks to him; hungering for human contact, he will do anything to keep her near. Trenton tries to build a new life with Brianna at the center, until his past tries to catch up with him.

After unfortunate events leave Brianna in a coma, Trenton eventually realizes that he must move on with his new life. He meets Elana, and, while she knows Trenton may never be over Brianna, they begin to settle down. Just as life seems to be moving along as it should, Brianna awakens, turning Trenton's world upside down.

Now, doesn't that sound interesting! You can learn more about the story by checking out our Facebook page here, or by coming back for weekly readings from the book in our updates.

After initial editing, the book is currently 440 pages long. Both hard and paperback are sized at 8.5 inches x 5.5 inches.

C.L. Montgomery has loved getting lost in books ever since she was a small child, now she wants to share her love of reading by writing stories across many different genres. Beyond For All Time, C.L. Montgomery has written children’s books, fantasy novels, and horror stories just to name a few styles. Most of what she writes is inspired by dreams she’s had: “We all have weird dreams, I just write them down.”

You can learn more about C.L. Montgomery and her other works by visiting her Facebook page here.

Shea Sitz - Graphic Designer, Editor, Project Manager. Shea is in the IT field by day and a number of other fields by night. He is a musician, video game designer/programmer, and an all around computer guru. He has an extensive background in graphic design and audio, video, and book editing which makes him a huge asset to our project. He is also an owner of Enterprise Publishing.

Evelyn Sitz - Project Coordinator, Videographer. Evelyn is sort of a "Jackie of all Trades." She has worn many hats in her life but is currently a photographer and artist. She is also secretary (or "Secretariat" as they call her. I guess cause they work her like a horse!) for Enterprise Publishing. Her ability to research and compile data has made her invaluable to this project.

  • Proofs of Hardback and Paperback: $500
  • 1,000 Paperback Copies: $4,645.60
  • 1,000 Hardback Copies: $7,086.03
  • Shipping from printer to us: $3,087.47
  • Packaging Supplies (mailers, shrink wrap, etc.): $280.05
  • Shipping & Distribution from us (United States): $6,730
  • Rewards (bookmarks, bookplates, etc.): $462.67
  • Fees, Incidentals, and Unexpected Costs: $2,208.18

When our campaign ends, it will take a minimum of nine weeks for us to receive them and then at least two weeks for us to begin fulfilling backer rewards. We expect to have all books shipped out by the end of October.

 

 

Bookmarks – Our bookmarks will be created with the book’s cover art as it will appear on the dust jacket.

E-book- The e-book will be available within two weeks after funding of the campaign. Any additional items included in the pledge will ship separately.

Paper and Hardback Copies – backers who pledge at least $15 will receive a copy of the book.But, not just any copy, a limited-edition Kickstarter copy with a pretty little foil stamp that says so.

Signed Books – Each backer that pledges to the 21st Century, Romance, Timeless, Transcendence, For All Time, and Character Tiers will receive their copies signed by the author. The author agreed and told us not to limit it, so let’s see if we can make her regret it. That’s right people, I wanna see her hand cramping so bad that she never wants to hold a pen again! Don’t worry, it won’t affect her writing, that’s what typing’s for.

Bookplates – What’s a bookplate, you ask? You remember the “This book belongs to” page in books when you were a kid? Well, it’s like that except for grownups, and your grandmother isn’t going to write your name in it; unless you want her to! Our bookplates are adorned with custom artwork and each backer who pledges at least $100 will get one with their name (or whatever name they want) printed on it; unless you really want your grandmother to write it, in which case message us and we’ll leave it blank.

Dedications – While we will be giving an all-encompassing thank you to everyone who pledges, backers who pledge at least $500 will receive a personal dedication in our book, and who doesn’t like seeing their name in print?! Well maybe I can think of a couple of people. But, hey, all press is good press, right?

Character – So you don’t just want a place in our dedication page? Well, then pledge at least $750 and C.L. Montgomery will name a character after you in one of her future books. We will even let you know when that book is coming out so you can check it out. Be warned you could end up being a troll in a fantasy novel, a dinosaur in a children’s book, or an innocent bystander in a comic book. In all of the possibilities it is likely you will die except maybe in the children’s book, but you never know.

While we haven't completely mapped out stretch goals yet, we do have some ideas. Most of what we would like to aim for is geared toward improving the book by adding details like embossing and foil stamping. We are also discussing the possibility of doing an audio book. However, we do know that if we go above our goal we will increase the number of books we print and the number of books we donate to libraries. So, check back as the campaign progresses to see what we've come up with.

projectTitle: Here Comes The Day CD Heather Innes
projectDescription: "Here Comes The Day"  is my first solo CD since 1994! I've been gigging as a folk singer in the UK, Australia, Thailand, Canada and the USA since 1990 but for most of that time I have performed and recorded in bands and duos. "Here Comes The Day" is my creative way of returning to solo recording and solo gigging.(albeit with occasional session musicians). The idea actually came to me while listening to one of my Christmas presents, a new CD by Northern Ireland musician Ben Sands, on my way to spend Christmas 2015 in Belfast. As I listened to Ben's songs I remembered the days when listening to a CD like that would inspire me to learn new songs and record them as a solo artist. Ben's song "Here Comes The Day" on his "Troubadour" album became my inspiration and title track for my CD and I began organising this project in faith at the beginning of 2016 by booking Red Barn Recording Studios and looking for new songs to record and sing plus writing a couple of my own. Eventually the studio dates were delayed a few months while I applied for funding (unsuccessfully) and also while the studio engineer had a spell in hospital for surgery and so recording began in September 2016.  All 18 tracks are now recorded and ready for manufacture but I need £1600 to produce 1000 CDs to sell at my upcoming tours in the UK and Australia.  As a self employed folk musician credit is not an option so I'm hoping you can help me by pre ordering copies of "Here Comes The Day" and/or any of the other options listed here.Thanks for listening and reading this. I hope I meet up with some of you further down the road! Heather.

projectTitle: Astropunk: Murder on Mars #2
projectDescription:
About Astropunk (click here to visit our Facebook page!)

Astropunk is a comic that has been over two years in the making, a labor of love to be sure. It is something we’ve poured countless hours and dollars into, both our own and from the generous backers of our first Kickstarter.

We couldn’t have gotten as far as we have without people supporting us and our vision every step of the way. So, we wanted to thank all of you, backers, potential backers, casual observers, and even the people who don’t stick around or choose to help us, each of you has added something of value to our work and for that we thank you.

Let's Recap

Astropunk #1 introduced us to Marshal Leslie Dent and the world of Astropunk on a micro level. We watched as she moved through the streets of Nova Roma, and the Reservation hunting a woman on the run from an importunate vice president of Vulcan Mining Corp.

Trying to track her to her last known whereabouts, Dent has a dangerously close encounter with a cloaked figure also on the look out for the same missing woman. Fortunately for Marshal Dent, their paths have yet to cross.

The book wraps up with a punch as billionaire philanthropist, and genius, Adam Ogden and his close friend and associate Ariel Jordan discovering that their invention to bring sustainable water to the less fortunate people of Mars is one step closer to completion.

Though this is not all that transpires inside the pages of Astropunk: Murder on Mars #1, so if you have yet to read it, we've got a Reward Tier for that, and you can take a look at our initial Kickstarter by clicking the linked image below. 

 

With that covered, it's time to move onto...

Astropunk Issue #2!

First, let's take a second to soak in the beauty that is Steve Thomas' newest cover. It's a thing of beauty, isn't it? 

The book follows Leslie Dent as she navigates her way through a twisting cesspool of lies, greed, and murder. It is our ode, of sorts, or homage, to the great pulp writers and stories of the 50’s, and the classic noir films they would inspire.

But, underneath the trappings of style, there is some fairly dark commentary on the nature of our own world, and the direction we see it heading. Astropunk is distinctly dystopian. We have made no bones about clearly stating that from the outset. Vulcan Mining Corp. controls nearly every aspect of life on Mars.

Stavros Konstantinious, the Vice President of Human Resources for Vulcan, in Nova Roma (The Vulcan city on Mars), is a man not to be trifled with. When Vulcan says “Human Resources” they aren’t just talking about who you file your workplace harassment claims with, they mean Humanity as a Resource. They manage housing, food, healthcare, vices, work related duties, and even water. It is this last part that has sparked the confluence of events that start Leslie Dent on her path. 

Thank you for taking the time to read this (hopefully you have), below you will find some bios for the team who’ve worked on this project, and their duties, you will also find some preview pages and other various artwork.

Let's Look At Some Art

Print Rewards

 

 

Book Previews

Issue #1 Revisited

To remind you of the story style and tone, we created an Issue #1 'Revisit.' Enjoy.

 Issue #2 Preview

Here are the first 5 pages of issue #2. 

 

  

 

  

Team Bios

Robert Farinholt (Co-Creator/Co-Writer): Rob Farinholt is a firefighter, writer, and father of two. He enjoys comic books, astronomy, and dihydrogen monoxide. 

Kenneth Centers (Co-Creator/Co-Writer): Lives in Southeastern Virginia with his wife and daughter; he loves the comics medium for the stories they can tell. Ken has been everything from a poker dealer and gambler, to a classically trained chef, and now he writes comics. His history with Robert goes back 20+ years, unfortunately for Rob.  

Paul Gori (Illustrator): Paul resides in Quartz Hill California, where he enjoys a quiet life with his three young boys, wife, and dog, Zoey. He is currently illustrator on a number of projects, aside from Astropunk, namely OathBound and Psycho Path. He is also working on his creator owned title Miami Bitchin', which he wrote and illustrated alongside Astropunk's very own Shawn M Greenleaf.

Hector Rubilar (Colorist): With 10 years of professional experience, and dozens of credits to his name, Hector still manages to teach art and Adobe Photoshop at the Bradesco Foundation (a non-profit, vocational training center) in Sao Paulo, Brasil. 

Shawn M. Greenleaf (Editor/Letter/Comics Whisperer): Quickly becoming known as ‘The Leditor,’ Shawn is the Letterer & Editor for Astropunk. His resume also includes Lettering & Editing for the following series: the apocalyptic horror series, Escape from Jesus Island, the Fantasy/Western, Oathbound, the grindhouse series, The Infernal Pact/Whore of Babylon, and the all-ages ghost hunter story, Full Moon Fredo. To be quite honest, that’s just a few of the projects he is or has worked on. He’s a proverbial ‘glutton for creative punishment’ and just can’t say ‘No’ when a new, exciting project comes his way.

Steve Thomas (Cover Art): Before becoming a freelance illustrator/graphic artist, Steve worked for newspapers creating graphics and illustrations for every section of the paper. His love for vintage poster, propaganda and product art from the early 20th century and an interest in retro-futuristic art from the mid-20th has shaped his style of artwork to what it is today.

Paula Goulart (Flatter): Professional assistant comic colorist and flatter from Sao Paulo, Brasil. Works for independent comic creators, artists, and publishers. Attended the Brazilian Academy of Art - ABRA in 1996-1998, graduated an Associate of Arts Degree in Arts, Drawing, and Comics. Has worked as Graphic Designer for several years and received 2 awards in 2006 as Pattern Designer Revelation and Pattern Designer Talent at FENATEC (Textile and Garment International Fair) and FENIT 2006 (Textile Industry International Fair) in Sao Paulo, Brasil.

Ramon Hitzeroth (Inking Assistant): A 26-year-old man-boy all the way from South Africa (And no, there's no lions walking freely on the roads). During the day, I consider myself a professional Web Developer, and during the night I get in touch with my creative side and draw whatever my brain can come up with. For Astropunk, I work together with Paul Gori to make sure the pages are clean and ready for the Flatterer and Colourist.

projectTitle: qualMeter XT: Greater Experience on Cable/Charger Testing
projectDescription:
Introducing the QooPow™ qualMeter XT

 

qualMeter XT is an extension board, a DIY kit, which is particularly made for qualMeter X version to extend its functionalities and to enable its firmware upgrading ability. To understand and find out more about the qualMeter X, please access our previous KS campaign page or our official web site www.qoopow.com and forum.qoopow.com. Currently, qualMeter XT has two versions:

1. qualMeter XT Basic  

The Basic version gives you the ability to upgrade firmware of qualMeter X and the ability to have Beeping Indication with the testing results.  

2. qualMeter XT Network  

The Network version has embedded the network cable connectivity testing upon the XT Basic version. It brings you the ability to test your RJ45 twisted-pair network cable and even the RJ11 phone cable.  

The XT Network Kit comes with two parts, an XT Network Board which is going to be mounted on qualMeter X and will be plugged at one end of the testing network cable. And an XT Network Transmitter which will need to install a 9V battery on it to be used at another end of the testing network cable.

Functions of qualMeter XT (extension board)

Firmware Upgrading  

As we have promised, the original qualMeter X was designed to be upgradable which allows qualMeter X to extend its function and fine tune its testing ability and results in the future. Now, with qualMeter XT, you can easily upgrade the firmware of qualMeter X version via a commonly used MicroSD/TF card.  

Beeping Indication  

Inspired by one of our previous Angels, THANK YOU! qualMeter XT has integrated an unique Beeping Indication coding system to help people who have difficulties on reading the LED indicators. The Beeping Indication is also a very useful and convenient way to quickly knowing the testing results without visually read the LED indicators.  

The above is the beeping example of a network cable testing. The details of Beeping Indication coding system will be described and showing later here.  

Network Cable Connectivity Testing  

As one of the planned Extensions, Network Cable Connectivity Testing is now available. You can test twisted-pair network cable with RJ45 connectors (8-pin) and even the phone cable with RJ11 heads (4-pin).

DIY Tutorial - qualMeter XT board installation

The upgrading DIY is a fairly easy process. The tool you'll need is only a small size Crosshead Screwdriver, that’s it. Open the Upgrading Supply Bag. Make sure you have the following items in the bag.  

  • Plastic Support Post x8 (for Shelled qualMeter X version, 4 for using, 4 spare)  
  • Φ2x5mm Tapping Screws x8 (for Shelled qualMeter X version, 4 for using, 4 spare)  
  • Φ2x4mm Fine Thread Screws x4 (for Non-shelled qualMeter X version, spare screws)  
  • 16-pin Female Pin Header Connector x4 (for both qualMeter X version, 1 for using, 3 spare)  
  • Crosshead Screwdriver x1  

(Pic)

Now you can start to upgrade your qualMeter X to qualMeter XT. Please notice that the DIY installations are different according to the version of qualMeter X you have.

For Non-shelled qualMeter X

  • Simply unscrew the four screws on the back board of the qualMeter X. Then take off the back board. Please be careful not to touch the electronic components on the main board.  
  • Carefully mount the qualMeter XT board onto the main board. Make sure the female 16-pin connector is correctly plugged into the corresponding male 16-pin connector on the qualMeter X’s main board.
  • Mount the four screws back to secure the XT board. Then you are ready to go. 

For shelled qualMeter X

  • Carefully plug the 16-pin Female Pin Header Connector into the 16-pin extension connector on the XT board. Make sure the pins are not bended, and each pin is in position; 
  • Put the four plastic support posts on the corner of the qualMeter X shell’s back; 
  • Carefully mount the XT board with qualMeter X via the square hole with the 16-pin Female Pin Header Connector; 
  • Mount the four Φ2x5mm Tapping Screws on each corner to secure the XT board. Then you are ready to go. 

Firmware Upgrading for qualMeter XT

Once you have upgraded your qualMeter X to qualMeter XT, you are ready to upgrade the firmware. The firmware upgrading is very simple with few steps:

  • Download the newer version firmware file from our Website or Forum. (Operate on your computer)  
  • Unzip the file, and then copy and paste the“QX#.bin”file to the root directory on a MicroSD/TF card. (Operate on your computer)  
  • Slide the MicroSD/TF card into corresponding slot on qualMeter XT. (Please be sure that you have slid it in a right direction)  
  • Plug the qualMeter X (attached with XT board) into any 5v USB power source, the upgrading process will automatically start if qualMeter X detects there is a newer version of firmware in the MicroSD/TF card.  
  • Done!  

Tips:  

The firmware upgrading is going to take 2~3 seconds, which you would barely notice it. You’ll only find out that the starting time will delay for 2~3 seconds before the Charger Test LEDs start to run as usual. This will only happen when a new firmware has detected. Once the upgrading has been done, there will be no more upgrading to process unless a new one has been detected.

How does Beeping Indication work?

Beeping Indication is an unique way to indicate cable/charger testing results by sound. Instead of using human voice, we’ve chosen to use more common beeping way to simplify the results’ indication. A series of pre-set beeping codes with different tones have been defined for indicating different results. do-re-mi-fa-sol-la-ti-do are basic beeping elements that have been used to indicate results with different combinations.

Example of USB Cable test beeping indication 

1 short (150ms) ti. The above beeping indicates the Cable is top quality.

Example of Charger test beeping indication

3 long (600ms) ti. The above beeping indicates the Charger has 2A output capability with output compensation.

Example of Network Cable test beeping indication

Continuous do-re-mi-fa-sol-la-ti-High do. The above beeping indicates a good RJ-45 network cable.  

Faulty beeping code 

ti + Low Do. The above beeping indicates Shorted Cable or something wrong.

The design for the Beeping Indication is modularized, you can choose to apply or avoid beeping by simply plug or unplug a regular Passive Buzzer (commonly used on PCs) on the XT board.

The Network Cable Connectivity Test  

The qualMeter XT Network kit has brought you another testing capability on RJ-45 Network Cables, also a widely adopted cable in our modern society. Despite many people are using WIFI connections to access Internet, a wired network connection is still useful and required for stable and serious Internet applications. Now with qualMeter XT Network, it can not only test your USB cables and chargers for your charging quality but also tests your Network Cables connectivity for Internet applications.

First of all, install a 9V battery on XT Network Transmitter. Then you can start to test.

Notice: Due to the complicity of international battery transportation. The battery doesn't come with the rewards. You'll need to get your own 9V battery (PP3 battery) by yourself.

Note: qualMeter XT Network does not test the data transmission quality of the network cable.

Tips: qualMeter XT Network can also test the connectivity of regular telephone cable (RJ-11). Its 4-pin connector has the same type of physical layout but half-size narrower, which can be plugged into the middle of the 8-pin RJ-45 connector.

The Rewards for qualMeter XT

  

For Angels who wanted to pledge more than one item.  

It is not technically easy to pledge more than one item in a Reward due to Kickstarter’s policy. You have to add the price of items and the shipping together. It’s quite complicated and sometimes confusion, which caused us a huge chaos in our last campaign. However, we have our Angels from previous campaign who had backed more than one qualMeter X that might want to pledge more than one XT for them. We have prepared a Pledge Calculator especially for you (Click here to access).

Pledge Calculator is designed to help our Angels (Backers) who wanted to pledge multiple items in one Reward. Different discounts are applied based on the quantity you have pledged. The shipping cost is also going to be varied depending on the Quantity, Reward's Type and Your Location of course. It is highly recommended to use the calculator to avoid the complicity of the pledge calculation for multiple items and to minimize mistakes (Click here to access).

projectTitle: Broken to BEAST - Regain Your Health...Forever
projectDescription:
Why I'm writing BROKEN TO BEAST:

I'm overweight, in pain, held down by depression, and all around crappy life.  I am a shadow of my former self, a time when I could 

"[I train to]Take on any challenge of my choosing at any time of my choosing." - Coach Oscar

Ask anybody around me.  Until 2015, I would play semi-pro football, race 5K and be the first person over 200lbs to cross the finish line, run ultra marathons and mudruns, or you-name-it.  Our daily workouts kicked my (and others' tails) as we trained everything everyday.  

If I chose to do one of those, I would do it.  That was my BEAST Mode phase.  My nutrition was also intuitive and unforced.  I was just Coach Oscar.

Today, my back and knees constantly remind me that I'm now 40.  Well, my age has little to do with it.  My poor diet, lack of activity, and my depressive states are greater contributors.  Have you ever been held back by these factors?

What You are Supporting:

With your pledge, I am will be able to commit 100% of my time and resources to fulfilling the completion of this work.  It has been a concept for a while, now your support will help bring it to fruition, resulting in a 100% commitment to fulfill your rewards and partner in improving your health.

Why I Can be Trusted:

I've been in fitness since 2000.  The pursuit of developing this craft, expanding my knowledge, and my commitment to servicing your fitness challenges can be confirmed by many of my clients, present and past.  I also am committed to the fulfillment of my obligation to you.

What do YOU Get?

 You decide.  You can follow my progress as each chapter comes out.  You can add the 21-Day FIT KICK Challenge to jump start your progress.  If you want more, challenge yourself with the 101 Boot Camp Workouts.  Finally, if you choose the BEAST Immersion Coaching, I will be in your face everyday answering question, offering tips and shortcuts, and holding YOU accountable.  Enhance your success by immersing yourself in your own health.  It's better than any app, membership, or personal training program.  I know this, because I have put it together to exceed those platforms.

projectTitle: Kizingo Toddler Spoons: Cutlery Design Innovation for Kids
projectDescription:
KIZINGO's mission is to design products that are rooted in science and built to promote health in families and independence in kids - especially at the dinner table. Our flagship product is a toddler spoon, designed to work with the way kids hold utensils when they are learning to eat. Because of our design, it is easier for kids to successfully feed themselves, which research tells us is critical for the development of healthy eating habits.

We launched with right-handed spoons in March 2016 and are ready to expand our product line to include LEFT-HANDED spoons. We're turning to the Kickstarter community for help.

 

Over the last 3 decades, obesity rates in the US have tripled, due to changes in our diets, levels of physical activity, and the environment in which we live.

Of children aged 2-5 years old, nearly 23% are overweight or obese. Among those that are, there is a 60% chance that they will carry this excess weight throughout childhood and into adolescence.

There is a large and growing body of research that show that the period of time when kids are learning to self-feed - when they are transitioning to solid foods - is a crucial period when food habits are established. And increasingly we know that patterns created during this period influence eating behaviors all the way into adulthood.

Thus, it is critical that we provide the right tools for children to learn to self-feed successfully.

 

 

 

 

 

There are a number of features that make our spoons special. Kizingo spoons are:

  • Made in the USA! Designed in Blacksburg, VA - by parents, FOR KIDS 
  • Safe for your little ones (no BPA, Phthalates, PVC, or Lead)
  • Made of FDA-approved plastic which is made in the USA 
  • Dishwasher safe 
  • Specifically designed to encourage self-feeding 
  • Rooted in science, focused on health 
  • Meant to build confidence and independence

 

 

 People have a lot to say about our spoons. Here's a little taste:

 

 

 

 

 Kizingo co-founder and creator, Kiyah Duffey, is a nationally recognized nutrition expert. Her research has examined how the foods we eat impact our health, especially weight gain and heart disease. Kiyah's research has been featured in numerous media outlets including Oprah's O Magazine, the NBC Nightly News, Good Morning America and NPR's Morning Edition. But she's also a mom (to three little ones). After having kids, Kiyah realized that most tools meant for kids to use at mealtime don't actually work to support and encourage healthy habits. This is especially true of kids' utensils: even child-sized ones are poorly designed for how kids hold them. And Kiyah knew, based on research and her own experience, these "traditional" utensils would not encourage behavior that truly promoted health. So, with the support and encouragement of her co-founder, Lisa Sutherland, Kizingo was born.

 Why Your Support Matters

Every dollar we make is poured back into our company, as we continue to innovate and design products to promote our mission. With your support, we can finally bring mealtime success and independent feeding to all those LEFT-HANDED eaters out there! Your money will be used to:

  • Purchase left-handed spoons ($2,075)
  • Create left-handed packages- blister cards and custom designed blisters ($1,700)
  • Buy the tool needed to package the spoons ($725)

projectTitle: "Zany Riders" A Story from my Inktober 2016
projectDescription:
Hello there! Welcome to Zany Riders on Kickstarter!
I'm super excited to share the project with you ;D

My name is Julie Okahara. I am an artist from Sacramento, CA.
In 2015, I started my first Inktober challenge.
(Inktober is a drawing challenge to artists all over the world. During the month of October, an artist makes one drawing a day. It started in 2009 by an awesome artist, Jake Parker.)
The first year was fun and successful, but the second year I wanted to take the challenge a step further! So I made a little story to tell through my Inktober challenge! It was fun and challenging, and I learned a lot from it ;D 

 The story is about the little adventures of these three characters.

 It follows each character as they prepare for the greatest race of the year -the Trick or Treat Race!

 

 

I love how it all came out and I would love to share it with more people!
I could just make little black and white zines to keep it low cost. But, since I made all of the pieces with ink and water color, it would be super awesome to make full color books! Don't you think? ;g

If you would like to see all of my Inktober sketches, come check them out on my Facebook page! 

 

Final Look of the Book!

It will be perfect bound, about 5x8", and 40 pages.
No words, just art!!!

Since all original pieces are 5x7", I wanted to keep the final book to a similar size. Plus it will be a nice little size for everybody, including kiddos! ;D

projectTitle: The RPG Character Compendium
projectDescription:
You've joined an RPG group and a new world awaits! What kind of character will you create to represent yourself as you explore the awaiting wonders and challenges of these new lands?  

Could you be Kregg Froskaros, a monstrous barbarian who is more muscle than brains? Or perhaps Myridyn, a royal lady who wishes to explore the outside world away from her controlling parents?

This guide is designed to be used alongside your chosen system's player's guide or handbook, as a way of fleshing out the numbers and abilities provided there.

If you have issues creating a deep and interesting character, or simply need a way to spark the imagination, look no further than the RPG Character Compendium!

 This Compendium will feature 100 unique and exciting characters that can be quickly adapted to the RPG system of your choice. 

The Compendium will provide a detailed, pre-written backstory, a description of their mannerisms and behaviours, as well as tips and guides for every single character if you wish to switch things up. Most, if not all characters will feature concept art, but the specifics of appearance are always changeable to suit your desires. 

The characters within the compendium will be organised by mechanical type, with simpler, easier to play characters (such as Barbarians) at the start of the book, and more complex, deeper characters (such as Casters) towards the end. 

 Also in the Compendium will be a dedicated chapter to creating characters from scratch if you do not want to turn to pre-created characters for inspiration. This chapter will cover basics such as appearance, backstory, behaviours and motivations, as well as advice on how to create depth and realism to further your role-playing capabilities.

 

 

Tryx  

Description:  

Tryx is a quick-witted, ambitious Gnome. He has always lived among Human populations, trying to integrate into their society and make a big buck while doing so. Diminutive even for a Gnome, Tryx relies on ranged weapons such as his trusty crossbows during the rare occasions he finds himself in a fight.  

How to build Tryx:  

To create Tryx or a similar character, select the Gnome race, and Ranger class. If your chosen system does not include these options, select similar classes, specifically those which are capable with ranged weapons.  

Tryx relies on his Dexterity and Wisdom in both combat and social environments. Assign your highest scores to these abilites. Tryx is also charismatic, as he likes to talk his way out of situations rather than fight. Assign your third highest score to Charisma.  

The other stats are less important to the mechanical aspect of playing Tryx, so you can freely choose how to distribute your remaining ability scores.  

How to play Tryx:  

Tryx loves to talk, as much as possible, and is generally friendly to all until they give him not to be. Tryx would be capable of being the face of the party, if others are not willing. Tryx does not mind speaking to strangers.  

Tryx's innate social skills come from living in the bustling cities for his whole life. He has no affectionate relationships outside of his family, however he is not opposed to one. You can decide if his family still live there, if you wish.  

He also aims to get the best deal possible at all points. Tryx will constantly haggle over the smallest things, even the price of a drink. This can often cause annoyance among the traders he tries it on with.  

Tryx has tried, and failed, to become an affluent businessman in the city he resides in. As a result of the business' downfall, he owes big money to some less than enjoyable groups, and has taken up adventuring as a means of paying his debts.  

In combat, Tryx avoids melee at all costs, instead opting to skirt around the edges of the battlefield taking shots from safer positions. He also offers little by means of healing, and is unlikely to rush in to aid a fallen comrade. There will be 100 characters similar to this inside. Thanks for taking the time to check it out!

projectTitle: Troubadour Dream EP - Digital Release Date June 8
projectDescription:
Troubadour Dream EP

Turner in a Blue Sky Publishing is proud to announce Troubadour Dream, the debut EP of charter artist "Scuba" Steve Turner! The EP will be released in conjunction with Steve's stage appearances at the world-famous Tootsies on Broadway in Nashville during CMAFest in June 2017. The Troubadour Dream EP will be created using a 7-piece band (fiddle & steel - yes!) comprised of the leading studio musicians in Nashville. Good friend and talented Nashville artist Kennedy Fitzsimmons will contribute background vocal tracks; please visit her Facebook page!

Over the years, hundreds (if not thousands) of us have had the privilege of getting to know Steve personally. To a person, we've all been awestruck by his talent, but more importantly by his generosity, humility and kindness. I've lost track of the number of times he's dropped everything and literally crossed the country at his own expense to share his musical gift with family and friends at weddings, funerals, anniversary and birthday celebrations and other gatherings. I feel honored to be able to help Steve, not only with my own financial contribution, but by creating this Kickstarter event and offering all of you the opportunity to support Steve's Troubadour Dream. All funds raised by this event will be used to cover expenses in the production of Steve's EP and for production of merchandise. If we exceed our goal, excess funds will go towards further recordings and promotion. 

Steve's rich country sound is a product of his deep baritone to high falsetto vocal range and impressive command of vocal dynamics. In a time when it's hard to tell the difference between pop and country, Steve's signature sound leaves no doubt about what genre he's coming from. Whether he's singing traditional gospel, folk tunes, old country standards and 80's & 90's country, or putting his spin on rockabilly, classic rock and contemporary pop, you can't help but be impressed by his performance. With a full band or doing acoustic shows with just his guitar, Steve delivers performances that fill the venue.

Speaking of venues, Steve has appeared at venues from living rooms to churches, from Dubby's Deck to WeFest, from hometown pubs and bars to Nashville's premier honkytonks. In 2015 he continued his career as a full-time PharmD in Cherokee, NC so that he could be driving distance from Nashville. For the past two years he's been commuting to Nashville up to once a month making guest appearances on Broadway, participating in songwriter showcases and building friendships and working relationships with the most talented musicians on the strip. Club owners have told him he's got what it takes but he has to get to Nashville full time.

On April 30, Steve was offered a coveted one-hour slot on stage at world-famous Tootsie's Orchid Lounge in downtown Nashville during CMAFest in early June as well as associated vendor space to sell music and merchandise. A few conference calls later and he was a BMI artist, had studio time booked in Nashville with the city's top studio musicians, selected music for his Troubadour Dream EP, and created a new record label. Many thanks to Camilla Kleindienst and her team at Banner Music for coordinating all of this on literally a moment's notice.

Thank you in advance for your kind support of your friend and mine, "Scuba" Steve Turner as he pursues his Troubadour Dream in June! Don't forget to click the link to his page, like it and share it with everyone you know!!

projectTitle: Cares.Watch - Sicher alleine leben mit Kontakt zur Familie
projectDescription:
Moderne Technik soll hilfebedürftigen Menschen ermöglichen, ihr Leben weiterhin im gewohnten Lebensraum der eigenen vier Wände statt in einem Pflegeheim zu verbringen.  

Auf dem Bild sehen Sie Emilie mit ihrer Enkelin. Emilie lebt seit dem Tod ihres Mannes alleine im eigenen Haus. So oft es geht, machen sich die Kinder und Enkel auf den Weg, um nach Emilie zu schauen. Obwohl sie noch mobil ist und sich selbst versorgen kann, ist sie bei vielen Dingen unsicher geworden. 

Auch das Gedächtnis spielt öfters üble Streiche.
Trotzdem möchte Emilie nicht auf die gewohnten Spaziergänge verzichten und besucht auch gerne Freunde und Verwandte.  

Emilie fürchtet sich vor einem Sturz oder anderen medizinischen Notfällen. Meistens ist sie alleine und niemand könnte ihr helfen. Cares.Watch soll Emilie helfen, viel engeren Kontakt zu ihrer Familie zu halten. 

Ihre Tochter erkennt auf dem Smartphone jederzeit schnell und einfach, ob es Emilie gut geht.   

  • Ist sie nach dem Arztbesuch gut wieder zuhause angekommen? 
  • Ist sie morgens wie üblich aufgestanden oder liegt sie mit Kreislaufproblemen noch im Bett? 
  • Ist sie aktiv oder liegt nach einem Sturz bewegungsunfähig auf der Kellertreppe?  

Mit nur einem Tastendruck kann Emilie von überall aus umgehende Hilfe anfordern.  

Überall-Notruf  

Die Mobilfunknummern von Emilies Tochter, Schwiegersohn und Enkelin sind in der Uhr hinterlegt. Sollte Emilie Hilfe benötigen, drückt sie einfach den Knopf ihrer Cares.Watch und sofort wird eine normale Telefonverbindung mit der Tochter aufgebaut.
Sollte diese nicht erreichbar sein, werden die weiteren Nummern angerufen und Emilie kann ganz normal mit den ihr vertrauten Angehörigen sprechen.
Zusätzlich wird eine SOS-Nachricht (Email, optional auch SMS) versendet und die aktuelle Position ist abrufbar (1).  

 

Herzfrequenz-Messung

Cares.Watch misst in kurzen Abständen die Herzfrequenz direkt am Handgelenk.
Als Emilie neulich aufgrund ihrer Diabetes-Erkrankung einen Schwäche-Anfall erlitt, wurde umgehend ihre Tochter alarmiert. So konnte rechtzeitig Hilfe geleistet werden.  

Aktivitätserkennung

Cares.Watch erkennt sowohl allgemeine Bewegungen als auch Schritte. Mit Hilfe von Vergleichsdaten kann schnell und einfach überprüft werden, ob bei Emilie alles seinen gewohnten Gang geht oder etwas nicht in Ordnung ist.  

Ortung

Manchmal vergisst Emilie, warum sie gerade losgelaufen ist oder sie erinnert sich besser an frühere Begebenheiten als an die Gegenwart. Dann fällt es ihr schwer, die Orientierung zu behalten.
Neulich wurde sie von der Familie aufgefunden, die mittlerweile in dem Haus von Emilies längst verstorbenen Bruder wohnt.
Mit der Ortungsfunktion von Cares.Watch kann Emilies Tochter mit Smartphone oder PC jederzeit die aktuelle Position auf wenige Meter genau abrufen. (1)  

So viel wie nötig – So wenig wie möglich  

Es geht nicht um Überwachung. Eine Unterbringung im Seniorenheim wäre für Emilie die weitaus größere Einschränkung der persönlichen Freiheit. So lange wie möglich möchte sie ihren gewohnten Lebensraum nicht verlassen und ohne die Hilfe fremder Menschen auskommen. Dabei soll Cares.Watch helfen.  

Datenschutz  

Cares.Watch dient ausschließlich der Unterstützung eines möglichst selbständigen Lebens. Dementsprechend werden nur notwendige und aktuelle Daten erfasst.
Cares.Watch ist kein Fitness-Tracker oder ähnliches. Alle Informationen sind nur in einem geschützten Bereich abrufbar und somit für niemanden einsehbar, der nicht ausdrücklich befugt wurde.

Einfachste Bedienung auch ohne technisches Verständnis

Cares.Watch wurde konsequent so entwickelt, dass die für Emilie denkbar einfachste Bedienung möglich ist.  

  • Kurzer Druck auf die Taste: Anzeige von Uhrzeit, Datum und Akku-Ladung  
  • Langer Druck auf die Taste: Start der Notruf-Routine.

Philosophie

Unsere Familien haben sich verändert. Ältere und hilfsbedürftige Menschen sind oft auf sich alleine gestellt. Als Alternative zum Seniorenheim wollen wir das selbstbestimmte Leben im gewohnten Umfeld sicherer machen.
Nutzer von Cares.Watch und ihre Angehörigen sollen direkter in Kontakt bleiben können und somit Ängste abbauen. 

(1) GPS-Empfang kann in Gebäuden eingeschränkt sein. Zusätzlich werden WLAN-Signale zur Ortung Verwendet. Die letzte bekannte Position wird beibehalten.

projectTitle: eBay Reversed - Merchants Bid for YOUR Business!
projectDescription:
It all started with a problem that I personally had:  

Whether I was looking to go on vacation or leasing a car, I would spend a lot of time doing research and pricing out.  So I looked online for a website that can do this but to no avail.  There are plenty of websites that allow you to do the research and look for deals but nothing that allows you to put whatever you are looking for and let the merchants bid (at least for Cars and Travel)  

Basically I wanted to create somewhat of a reverse of eBay and something that:

  • Gave me the best price for what I was looking for
  • Saved me time on research and shopping around
  • Kept my contact information anonymous until I was ready (I didn't want merchants harassing me and pressuring me to purchase)
  • Free to use and secure

It took me some time to get this built as a flexible bidding platform, where I am able to add categories without writing code.  It also took time to make sure it can be built in a way where both parties find this valuable (customers saving time and money and merchants getting hot leads) 

The platform is live (website and mobile responsiveness) and is working well end to end but now we need to take it to the next level. 

Next level means:

1.  Get the word out.  Advertisement funds are needed.  I have tested various ad campaigns via Social Media and Google and have a plan of attack between social media and Google but the focus will be on Google.  Actually, when I tested Google Ad Words, it brought so much traffic for a minor test budget that it nearly crashed the site.  

2.  Minor enhancements to drive user conversion and enhanced experience.  I have taken time (2 years) to slowly build out the platform via various iterations and slowly exposing the capability and testing out the behaviors on both the customer and merchant end.  I have a list of enhancements that will drive conversion from someone hitting the site, to registering and then putting out a bid request.  To do that, I need to build separate landing pages that will tell the story:  past bids with deals that others have received, quotes from existing customers, reiterating that this is FREE to use for customers and they are anonymous until they select the winning merchant.  I also want to introduce pictures into the bid responses and other minor additions, to enhance user experience.

projectTitle: Pretty Vacant: Tijuana Special
projectDescription:
Former All-American Model/Athlete Gigi Gutierrez just wants to have fun and enjoy herself at a comic convention, but fate has other plans for her! Fellow cosplayers have been kidnapped, and with her best friend and a slightly bigoted mad scientist appealing to her conscience, she joins them in a perilous mission south of the border to rescue the young women from an evil cartel.  Can Gigi use her unique skill set, secret-weapon boyfriend and sarcastic wit to save them all from a fate prettier than death?   

Pretty Vacant: Tijuana Special is a 24-page black and white comic that is planned for sale at Comic-Con. The writer, John Villalino, has been in the business for over ten years and is very proud of his professional status at Comic-Con. The artist, Daniel Vega, has been making a name for himself as an online comic artist. They collaborated on previous issues that were published over the past three years, and we're excited to see they do this time around!

projectTitle: ASMR
projectDescription:
Have you ever stopped to listen to the silence or quiet noises, and felt gentle chills travel down your spine; or maybe even hang around your head? Did it feel like someone was gently stroking or massaging you? Did you want more, but didn't quite know what it was that you were after; only that the sensation felt nice and relaxing? Well that is ASMR (autonomous sensory meridian response).

I want to create that moment of bliss. I want to send tingles down your spine with the sounds I create; I want to relax you; and I want to send insomniacs to sleep. With the 3dio binaural microphone, I can do just that. ASMR videos are a revolution. They create a massage from sounds that at the very least will relax any listener, and they have the power to send insomniacs to sleep. ASMR is a great tool for meditation, and as a listener, I can say it does quite a bit for your mental health. If you want to listen to professional ASMR that will give you everything, then please send a donation this way so I can give you what you want.

projectTitle: The Yoga of Sound Legacy Project
projectDescription:
Welcome to the Yoga of Sound Legacy Project!

My name is Mata Mandir Singh Khalsa. Some of you may already know me from my previous recorded music, yoga seminars, live concerts and kirtans that I have given over the years in Europe, North America, Mexico and China.

I have been busy with music most of my life, and I can safely say it is my first and biggest love. So this project is not something new, but rather a continuation of a life-long study and commitment. In the last 40 years I have recorded almost 30 CD’s and cassette tapes. (For a sample of my music visit www.yogaofsound.)

With the advent of the digital era and a changing music industry, I will say that I have found it a little hard to adjust. Nonetheless, I am driven to continue composing music to the writings of the Sikh Gurus, the Kundalini Yoga mantras, and poetry from my teacher, Yogi Bhajan.

I now have over one-hundred compositions composed but not recorded. There is enough material for making perhaps 12 or 14 new albums! At my age (64), one starts to feel some limitation in the amount of time one has to finish creative projects – that and a bit of arthritis starting to creep in – so my feeling is, “If not now, when?” Or in the words of my teacher, “The time is now and now is the time.”

Working Together

I also feel the world’s cry for upliftment, happiness, fulfillment, and for finding new pathways to replace the old ways that are not working, particularly at this point in time. I have always felt that the more music of high vibration that I can produce, sing, vibrate and spread is my small way of contributing to the collective vibrations of peace and contentment in the world. The more we sit together to sing songs of the spirit and share words that promote kindness, compassion and healing, the better the world will become. It starts in ourselves and spreads from person to person; often through sound.

The Project's Goals

The Yoga of Sound Legacy Project has two main goals: The first is to record 3 new albums, in order to bring to life some of the many songs that I have previously composed but not recorded. The second goal is to renovate the Yoga of Sound website, so that the new albums I make in the future and the albums I have recorded in the past can all be available in one place for listening, download and purchase. Old titles will be available as I gain back the rights from the third party distributor, and new titles will be made available as soon as they are recorded.

Oh, and the Naad Yoga Book Blog

An additional feature that we are implementing in the Yoga of Sound website is the Naad Yoga Book Blog, which involves compiling the teachings of Naad Yoga, the Yoga of Sound, from a variety of sources.

My teacher Yogi Bhajan was a master of Naad Yoga, and I have spent 40-some years sifting through his teachings and collecting them. I have also gained much insight from various Indian Classical music teachers and masters and have spent many happy hours studying the teachings of the Sikh Gurus, whose mastery of Naad and the sound current are legendary. 

The blog postings are snippets from a larger body of information and teachings that will eventually be compiled into a book on Naad Yoga. Meanwhile, readers can view insights and previews from the book-in-progress through weekly blog posts, at www.yogaofsound.com.

In Conclusion... 

Through YOUR SUPPORT of the Yoga of Sound Legacy Project:

  • Three dynamic new albums will be created!
  • The Yoga of Sound website will be revamped and set up for the streaming and download of all my music!
  • The Naad Yoga Book Blog will continue to be offered as a complimentary resource at www.yogaofsound.com!

AND THIS IS JUST THE START! Remember that I have over a hundred compositions written but not recorded, and it is my humble duty to get them produced and out into the world.

How your donations will be used:

Our $15,000 fundraising goal will cover the recording, mixing, mastering, and cover art of the first three albums; fund the relevant website and administration work for Yoga of Sound; and cover the Kickstarter and payment processing fees.

If your amazing support adds up to MORE than $15,000, it will be channelled direcly into the making of MORE albums!! You might think that making three albums all in one shot seems like a lot, but I'll remind you that I've been doing this for a while, and there is still a lot more to come.

So that is the project…

Yogi Bhajan once told me that people will sing my songs for 300 years to come. For this reason, I am compelled to continue making sacred and uplifiting music and share it with others. The more people I can reach through the powerful sound current of the Naad, the better.

Are you with me on this? It must be a group effort to make it work!

I am very grateful for all of you who have bought my music in the past, or have attended my classes, lectures and concerts. Please join me in this last burst of creative energy and support the Yoga of Sound Legacy Project, by donating (check out the perks!) and sharing our campaign with your friends, family, and social networks.

Thank you always for your love and support.

Sat Nam, Mata Mandir Singh

projectTitle: Search & Rescue 7500 Lumen LED Offroad/Off-grid Lights
projectDescription:
The need for more light to support safety and function of the various high risk professional and service personnel, photography, and cinematography,  is the inspiration of creating the OffRoad Energy, LLC. M4M (Mini 4” Module) and was designed with durability, form, function and style in mind. The modules were designed to fulfill a need for heavy duty Off-Road bumpers on typical Off-Road vehicles used by Search and Rescue and Pro Off-Road race vehicles. There are  many applications ranging from Off-Road uses to many other environments, structures, and industries. Some of which are service and tactical security vehicles, Security Scene lights for Mobile command posts like FEMA, Police, Security and Military. Large agricultural machinery (Tractors, Conveyors, and processing plants) as well as large industrial equipment.

Just got back from playing in the woods and decide to do some Urban Testing.

 

Because of various inquiries and requests from these industries the M4M has evolved into a truly universal style utility work light.

Featuring:

  • Made in USA
  • The latest in LED chip technology
  • No flicker or pulsing which is great for photography and filming
  • several mounting options including a removable swivel/tilt mount,  through bulkhead mounting, Pipe/Conduit, and Tripod mountable.
  • Light source side protection with 3/8" thick wall in the 6061 aluminum cover
  • Proprietary scratch, break and fog resistant high impact glass.
  • Dust, water, and chemical resistant
  • Small compact design in contrast to its 5500 and 7500 lumen light output options. (3rd party tested)
  • Any Color Temperature between 2700K and 5000K (note: lowering the color temperature reduces the lumen output about 10%)
  • Precision Machined.
  • Hard Anodized coating.
  • Production Version coating can be customized at customer request as an upgrade. Coating options include: Anodizing (Any available color from our swatches), Powder Coating(Any color or finish), Cerakote (Any finish that Cerakote provides)
  • High Temp silicon jacketed wire
  • Silicon impregnated wire protection sleeve
  • Standard DeutschTech OEM style connectors
  • 12Vdc to 24Vdc
  • Production version can be converted to AC and dimmable at time of order.

The video is a demonstration of how tough our glass lens is..
Testing is the best part of the job!

      

Our light is a giant in technology compared to other LED utility lights on the market even against those from the major name brands. Over the years of being involved directly or indirectly to the industries that we are trying help we have tried to leave nothing out that would make our light the best that it can be. 100% designed, engineered, machined and assembled here in the USA. We are not trying to compete with any of the major brands. We are just trying to provide a great tool for those who need it.

OFFROAD ENERGY, LLC. has engaged with several sources of interest throughout all industries and applications listed or mentioned above. We have been vigorously working toward preparing to take our product to market. As it stands now our product is now patent pending. Now it is time for us to hire the appropriate individuals and firms to assist us with this venture. To enlist such individuals and firms we must first have the resources in place such as our manufacturing process to be established and product on hand in the form of parts inventory. This will enable OFFROAD ENERGY, LLC. to begin the journey to success.

Coming from military, construction and police families our passion for what we are doing is ingrained in us. We want to help the people that help and protect us and our way of life

projectTitle: 14 year-old Blind Harmonica Player Recording New Album
projectDescription:
Hi everybody! My name is Frankie Moran and more importantly this is my son Cole. Together we perform as the musical duo Blind Wind.

We are raising money to record a full length original studio album in the styles of country/folk/Americana featuring Cole on harmonica. All of the songs were written by me, Cole's dad, and encompass stories about Cole and what it's like raising a child with special needs – who also happens to be a fine musician! The songs will be recorded in a way that a smaller band could perform them live.

Cole is 14-years-old. He has cognitive delays, early onset scoliosis and has been blind since birth. Through all of Cole's challenges he is full of life and has become an exceptional musician. His love for music is what drives him and playing the harmonica is what gives him the most joy.

Cole has performed on many stages from Tennessee to Texas and all along the East Coast. He has been featured on NPR and Voice of America.

We are trying to give Cole the best life we can while preparing for the future. Playing music is a profession Cole could maintain throughout his life.

Your donation will go towards studio time, musicians, promotion, CD printing along with other expenses involved in creating this album and furthering Cole's musical journey. Thank you for your interest. Your donation is greatly appreciated!

projectTitle: PeakFitPro Isometric Exercises Gym
projectDescription:
PeakFitPro Isometric Exercise Gym

The PeakFitPro Gym is the perfect marriage in strength training that offers unparalleled; 1.) Safety, 2.) Efficiency and, 3.) Expected Results.

We’ve found NOTHING that rivals this trio of advantages in a single apparatus in the world. With a 5000 pound load cell and our revolutionary new technology, the PeakFitPro offers the ability to exercise each muscle group to dramatically increase strength and can accommodate most every segment of the population.

The most crucial needs for the completion of the PeakFitPro Gym for Isometric Exercises

1. Manufacturing ready files produced from the prototype.

We are working closely with a large fabrication company with experts in metal fabrication as well as mechanical engineers. With their help we’ve incorporated numerous improvements to the machine and are nearing our final design. Once the physical prototype is fully tested and approved, manufacturing CAD files will be produced.

2. Completion of the Bluetooth Board

We have an electrical engineer that has developed the first 2 generations of the Bluetooth board for us. As always, modifications need to be made when bringing a new innovative technology to the world. We believe we are nearing the final stage to this technology and it looks like it will be able to have the resolution and accuracy to measure the weight with 1/10 pound increments, which is absolutely incredible for a machine of this type.

3. Software Development

Apple and Android based applications that offer the technology and information that has never been available with isometric exercises like this before. We’ve defined a number of core elements these applications need to accomplish. Then, we will be working on the higher level functions to offer the most complete experience in exercise and data feedback the PeakFitPro machine can provide. Our specialized software engineers have nearly completed our core requirements for both Apple and Android devices. Although it is not yet functional to show you as of the posting of this campaign, I have added a video and picture to the gallery so you can see that the Bluetooth board has been fabricated. As soon as the app is functional with the bluetooth board, I will make a video available to show the incredible functionality, but for now, you can see from the video that it is being developed and is reading information from the load cell. The machine itself is 100% functional as you can see from the video above. 

We’ve not found a machine anywhere in the world that combines all of the advancements and advantages of the PeakFitPro.

projectTitle: Nerds Night Out
projectDescription:
Today is the day, tonight is the night, for you and your nerdy chums to attempt the impossible; full societal re-integration. What better place to do it than the local watering hole? After all, that's where TV and movies say people hang out. Venture forth, nerdy ones. With swag in hand, money in your pants, and ADVENTURE on your lips. Can you survive the outside world and libations beyond your wildest dreams? Do you have what it takes to reign supreme as HEAD NERD!?! Get ready for NERDS NIGHT OUT!

Nerds Night Out is a competitive card game where players race to collect sweet nerdy objects (like magical dice or awesome new cell phone games) in an attempt to gain the most Nerd Cred and officially become the coolest person in the room. But watch out, your friends aren’t going to let you claim that title so easily! You are at a bar after all, so other players can stop you from achieving your final form by getting you drunk and stealing your stuff!

 

Our launch video covered the basic rules for the game pretty concisely, but for those who want to know more about what you'll see in Nerd's Night Out, we'd like to direct your attention to this video right here. 

But what's that you say? You're one of those weird people who likes to use their eyes to read things?!? Geez, well just for you, here's the basic rules of the game in good old fashioned print form :)  

WHAT'S IN THE BOX:
1x Coin Purse 
16x Coins and a pouch to put them in
1x Bar Menu
1x D6
154x Cards
1x Peg board to track everyone's points

GAME SET UP:
Shuffle the STUFF DECK. Each player draws 4 cards from the STUFF DECK. Make sure the COIN PURSE is fully loaded, as your night will not be a cheap one. Lastly, make sure that all players can see and read the BAR MENU.

WINNING THE GAME: At the end of any player's turn, if any player has 15 (or more) NERD CRED, then the game ends and that player wins. Remember though, the player doesn't win the game until the turn ends, so other players always get a chance to try and stop them with ONE-SHOT cards.

STUFF DECK EXPLAINED:
The STUFF DECK represents all the cool stuff you and your friends are going to do and buy tonight. This varies from “talking about what you saw on the web last night”, to “showing off the latest cool gadgets you purchased” to any number of other fun things. There are 5 types of cards in the STUFF DECK

ITEM CARDS: These represent cool things you can buy to prove your nerdiness, but at a price! Item cards must be purchased from your hand using MONEY. ITEM cards usually give you NERD CRED while they remain in play and under your control (if they leave play or you lose control of them then you lose the NERD CRED). Some ITEM CARDS do not give NERD CRED. In those cases, the cards typically grant some other bonuses.

ONE SHOTS:
These cards can be played at any time on any player's turn. These cards represent the activity and conversational part of the evening. They are called ONE-SHOT's because they only activate once, as soon as you play them, then they're placed in the DISCARD PILE. If a ONE-SHOT card effects your NERD CRED total then keep it in play to help keep track.

COMPANIONS:
These cards represent interesting people who you met at the bar, or people you invited to come along with you. Be careful though, not all COMPANIONS are good. We've all had that night where you just can't get rid of a creep. Some COMPANIONS give NERD CRED, others don't, but most have fun game changing abilities (sometimes all it takes is 1 new person in the group to really mix things up). Each player is limited to only having 1 COMPANION in play at a time, unless otherwise stated on the cards.

APPS:
These cards represent cool applications you have downloaded onto your SMART PHONE. Just like ITEMS; APPS typically cost MONEY to buy and give you NERD CRED while they remain in play and under your control. Some APPS have no effect unless you have a SMART PHONE ITEM in play. Others give NERD CRED even without a SMART PHONE in play, but would give more if you had one. This information is always printed on the card.

BOOZE: Libations, the real reason we get out of bed in the morning. BOOZE gives players DRUNK POINTS. BOOZE can be purchased with MONEY by either buying BOOZE cards from your hard or buying them from the BAR MENU. BOOZE cards typically cost less or give more DRUNK POINTS than BOOZE purchased from the BAR MENU. BOOZE can be bought for any player, even yourself. Typically though, you want to be a nice human being and buy drinks for your friends. After all, sharing is caring!

BAR MENU EXPLAINED: The BAR MENU works just like purchasing BOOZE cards from your hand. However, since buying drinks from the BAR MENU didn't require any cards from your hand, the drinks often cost more or aren't as effective (that's what you get for buying domestic!).

DRUNK POINTS EXPLAINED: When a player reaches 10 (or more) DRUNK POINTS, they have become too drunk to participate in the conversation, and they need to sober up a bit. That player must skip their next turn, and whichever one of their generous friends bought them the last drink gets to steal something from them (aren't friends great).

 

Now, we know what you’re all thinking: “wow, people really love this game AND it seems super fun. I should give these guys all my money right now!" And you’d be right! But let’s be real. In these troubling Internet times of “Perfect Girlfriends” and “Nigerian Princes” how can you really know who you’re talking to without seeing some proof? Valid point! So we encourage you all to please take a few moments to get to know the game’s creator, Ben Bratzel. Once you do, we’re sure you’ll start uncontrollably throwing money at your computer screens in an attempt to get this game done faster (NOTE: please do not actually start uncontrollably throwing money at your computer screens. We here at Misfit Children are not, in fact, inter-dimensional beings able to retrieve money that bounced off your screens and fell on the floor. If we were. we wouldn't need to launch a Kick Starter).

 

Misfit Children is an independent graphic design and game studio. We are a co-operative group who work in multiple disciplines of design, but we love games and helping people achieve their dreams.

Lastly, and most importantly; we here at Misfit Children take our work pretty seriously, seriously enough to actually put the game down and come up with a real plan to get this thing finished. Here’s our amazingly detailed plan to get this game done and into your loving hands (brace yourselves):

  • Get Money
  • Throw Party
  • Sell Game

It's just that simple!

Jokes aside, we sat down with our art team and our print brokers and had some pretty real conversations about monetary needs and time constraints to complete this project. To be 100% transparent, here's our projected timeline for completion:

  • STEP 1: It'll take up to 4-5 months to complete Art and finalize design and to submit everything to our vendors and brokers.
  • STEP 2: Next, we wait patiently for proofs of everything to come back from our vendors and brokers.
  • STEP 3: Once proofs are approved, it'll be another 3 months (max) to get the game and all other rewards back from our various vendors.
  • STEP 4: Pack it all up all and ship it all out!

projectTitle: Eagle Force Pulp: The Cat in Eight Lives Left
projectDescription:
Cat weighs the box in his hand. His right hand slides off the wall to the right of the safe door and, in one fluid movement, he whirls and draws his pistol from a shoulder holster. 

“Well played, Cat--better known as Lee Fine, man about town,” a figure sits, calm and unphased, in a plush armchair in the far corner. “I have to admit, I didn’t give you enough credit.” 

“The Pearls weigh more than the box they were apparently in. I also suspected this inside job was a bit too easy, as they say in the movies, McClellan.”

Where did Eagle Force's battle against R.I.O.T. (Roving International Organization of Terror) really begin? It's 1970s New York City, and The Cat is where it all starts.

The Cat: Eight Lives Left is the first Eagle Force Pulp novella that tells the story of Lee Fine, a cat burglar roped into taking on one big job for an agency so secret it doesn't even have a name. Eight Lives Left plants narrative seeds that will come to bloom as far forward in the Eagle Force timeline as the upcoming Monster Force. It weighs in at as a 64-page pocket-sized (5.06 x 7.81 ) paperback book, with a limited print run for this first cover.

Written by Christopher Irving, right after the Eagle Force Strikes trading cards, this is an homage to all things Ian Fleming, as this cat burglar begins his journey into becoming America's leading secret agent.

Reward levels include the book itself in a regular or signed and personalized edition, and also a limited metal card of The Cat--specially priced at just $5 with the signed edition. It goes for $10 as a post-campaign Add-On.

 

If we're really ambitious and pass the $600 goal, Eight Lives Left gets an illustration by artist Tim Shinn when we hit our stretch goal of $800.

Reaching $1,100 gets the stretch goal of a metallic foil Eagle Force trading card of The Cat, designed to go with the earlier Eagle Force Strikes! Goldie Hawk card.

Anything past that is classified for now.

Eagle Force Pulp promises to bring those declassified stories and mission to light, and it all starts with Eight Lives Left.
